title: Good Omens - Pigeon Animatic
author: Eugiius
comment: This looks amazing!! I love the emotions you so clearly write on Crowley's face and the color choices too!!
bye i have no knowledge of these characters other than they hurt me and i almost cried
I'm not crying I just having something in my eye is all

I really love this, it's phenomenal. Especially the way Aziraphale and Crowley cry each other's colors, like they're part of each other-- and then how the holy water container is blue, which I think is associated with heaven since the demons are a darker shade of pink and crowley is as well, just lighter, it would make sense if heaven was also tied to blue. I love the colors and the shifting between the lineart- drawing two of the same must have been timely but the outcome is amazing, gives a distraught atmosphere that now everytime I watch I immediately have tears in my eyes. Beautiful, amazing. Thank you for this masterpiece <3

Oh lord the song was sad and the colors and the drama and AY imma go cry for a decade if your happy it was so sad..... goes to a corner and sobs grossly SEE WHAT CHA DID MY HEART ITS BROKEN keeps crying
